comments.html:
I'm surprised you did not include 'Use tools like Netsim-Tools to stage and test configurations on virtual topologies before applying them in the field'

And (bonus points) you can even integrate those tests in your CI/CD pipeline (for example on Github) - provided you picked the right vendors of course, the ones that make their images easily accessible (as in 'docker pull ghcr.io/nokia/srlinux')

The ultimate GitOps workflow: 1. Check in configuration change 2. Git CI/CD runs automated tests, applying the config changes to virtual devices 3. If the tests pass, the config change is applied to the network (in stages)
comments.name: Jeroen van Bemmel
